fiction.title: The Great Gatsby
fiction.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
fiction.description: A tale of the American Dream in the roaring 1920s.

fiction.author: George Orwell
fiction.description: A dystopian society ruled by Big Brother, where truth is manipulated.

fiction.title: Pride and Prejudice
fiction.author: Jane Austen
fiction.description: Elizabeth Bennet navigates love and societal expectations in Regency-era England.

fantasy.title: The Hobbit
fantasy.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
fantasy.description: Bilbo Baggins embarks on an adventure to reclaim treasure guarded by a dragon.

fantasy.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer Stone
fantasy.author: J.K. Rowling
fantasy.description: Harry Potter discovers he is a wizard and begins his adventure at Hogwarts.

fantasy.title: Eragon
fantasy.author: Christopher Paolini
fantasy.description: A young farm boy discovers a dragon egg and becomes a Dragon Rider.

scifi.title: Dune
scifi.author: Frank Herbert
scifi.description: A young nobleman navigates politics and rebellion on the desert planet Arrakis.

scifi.title: Ender's Game
scifi.author: Orson Scott Card
scifi.description: A young boy is trained to be humanity's savior against an alien threat.

scifi.title: Neuromancer
scifi.author: William Gibson
scifi.description: A washed-up computer hacker is hired for one last job in a cyberpunk dystopia.

mystery.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
mystery.author: Stieg Larsson
mystery.description: A journalist and a hacker investigate a 40-year-old missing persons case.

mystery.title: Gone Girl
mystery.author: Gillian Flynn
mystery.description: A woman goes missing, and the mystery surrounding her disappearance unravels.

mystery.title: Big Little Lies
mystery.author: Liane Moriarty
mystery.description: A story of family secrets, lies, and murder at a school.

nonfi.title: Educated
nonfi.author: Tara Westover
nonfi.description: A memoir about a woman who grows up in a strict family in rural Idaho and later escapes to learn about the world.

nonfi.title: Becoming
nonfi.author: Michelle Obama
nonfi.description: The memoir of former First Lady Michelle Obama, tracing her life from childhood to the White House.

nonfi.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
nonfi.author: Yuval Noah Harari
nonfi.description: A thought-provoking exploration of the history of human beings, from ancient history to modern times.
